text: Aiboa is a station of line 1 of Metro Bilbao. It is located in the neighbourhood of Aiboa, in the municipality of Getxo. The station opened on 11 November, 1995. == Station layout == It is an at-grade, open-air station with one island platform. === Access === * 20px 20px 19 Txakursolo St. * 20px 20px 17 Txakursolo St. * 20px 20px Station's interior == Services == === Metro services === The station is served by Line 1 to Etxebarri, Ibarbengoa and Plentzia. There are trains to Etxebarri and Ibarbengoa every five to ten minutes, and services to Plentzia every twenty minutes.Official Schedules at Metro Bilbao website ==See also== *Line 1 *Metro Bilbao *Getxo == References == Category:Metro Bilbao stations Category:Railway stations opened in 1995
title: Aiboa (Metro Bilbao)
